description.en: Website and its creation. Internet marketing and website. Wordpress. Google Analytics. Search Engine Optimization. Web analytics. Content marketing. Integrity.
description.et: Veebileht ja selle loomine. Internetiturundus ja veebileht. Wordpress. Google Analytics. Otsingumootoritele optimeerimine. Veebianalüütika. Sisuturundus. Terviklikkus.

objectives.en: The aim of the course is to provide basic knowledge of website creation and management, search engine optimization and web analytics, and to relate the above to content marketing, so that learners can create discoverable and relatable web pages.
objectives.et: Õppeaine eesmärk on anda põhiteadmised veebilehe loomise ja haldamise, otsimootorite optimeerimise ja veebianalüütika kohta ning seostamine sisuturundusega, et õppijad oskaksid luua leitavaid ja kõnetavaid veebilehti.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon the completion of the course the student:
1) knows and be able to compile the initial task of a website, which is in line with an internet marketing strategy;
learning_outcomes.et: 1) teab ja oskab koostada veebilehe lähteülesannet, mis on kooskõlas internetiturunduse strateegiaga;

learning_outcomes.en: 3) knows the possibilities of the free content management system Wordpress;
4) understands the role of search engine optimization;
5) knows the possibilities of web analytics;
6) is able to create a simpler website with the necessary attachments;
learning_outcomes.et: 6) oskab luua lihtsama veebilehe koos vajalike lisadega;

learning_outcomes.en: 7) is able to create content for websites;
8) knows and be able to apply the basic principles of content marketing;
learning_outcomes.et: 8) teab ja oskab rakendada sisuturunduse põhiprintsiipe;

learning_outcomes.en: 9) understand the integration of a website and its various parts with marketing and be able to monitor the necessary connections in order to ensure integrity;
learning_outcomes.et: 9) mõistab veebilehe ja selle erinevate osade integreeritust turundusega ning oskab jälgida vajalikke seoseid, et tekiks terviklikkus;

learning_outcomes.en: 10) is able to optimize a website for a search engine;
11) is able to use the basic tools of Google Analytics for web analytics.
learning_outcomes.et: 11) oskab kasutada veebianalüütika jaoks Google Analyticsi peamisi vahendeid.
